text: I started jogging;
I mentioned that to a friend of mine
who does it a lot
and he was like, "Oh, you need to shave your legs
so you go faster."
This guy has a beard.
I was like, "No, I don't need to... you know,
I'm fine with my resistance workout."
But he was persistent.
He was like, "No man, listen.
I've been riding my bike to work for years
and I started shaving my legs every day;
cut two minutes off the commute."
So how long does it take you to shave?
You know, you can shave your legs faster
if your arms are shaved.
I read this article online that had all these
amazing facts about the human body, and
one of them said that the average human being's skin...
our skin is so sensitive
we can feel the weight of a bee's wing.
That's one ten-thousandth of an ounce.
If that is true, I'm below average....
I've gone an entire day without realizing
I had another pair of my underwear in my pant leg.
